summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SalesCommand Enterprise platform. Backend APIs are 92.6% functional with 25/27 tests passing. Frontend loads correctly with working authentication, navigation, and core UI components. Main issues are CORS configuration and dashboard data loading.

flaky_endpoints.impact: Revenue trend chart cannot load data

ui_bugs.issue: Charts show width/height errors and cannot render properly

integration_issues.issue: CORS errors when accessing backend - frontend trying to access wrong backend URL
integration_issues.details: Frontend making requests to https://sales-intel-hub-3.preview.emergentagent.com instead of configured URL

integration_issues.issue: Logout functionality not found or not working properly

issues: Dashboard KPI cards showing $0 values due to API failures
Empty charts due to data loading issues

passed_tests: Login page loads correctly with demo accounts
Navigation to all main pages (Accounts, Opportunities, Activities, KPIs, Incentives, AI Insights)
Accounts page shows seeded data with proper table and stats
Add Account modal opens and closes correctly
Backend CRUD operations for accounts, opportunities, activities, KPIs, incentives
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix CORS configuration issue - frontend is accessing wrong backend URL. Investigate dashboard stats and revenue trend API endpoints returning 520 errors. Add proper logout functionality to user menu.
